attributes.action: The Conservative Party should be split into two parties (Pro EU and Anti EU).
attributes.background: I would like to start a petition to propose that the the Conservative Party should be split into two separate parties, the Pro-EU Cons and the Anti-EU Cons and they should never to be allowed to combine again because their in-fighting will never end. It's irritating and embarrassing to this country.

rejection.details: This would be a matter for the Conservative party, not the Government or Parliament as a whole.
